Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled benefits. Given its exceptional quality and the time invested in its development, I believe it's worth more than what many might initially consider. I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $15000. This is an opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
